segments.text: I want to settle my account .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Wait for a moment . Mr . Bush.this is your bill , please sign your name here
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well , I think something must be wrong with my bill . I didn't have any laundry .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry , we will connect with the room service.Please Warta moment .
segments.speaker: S2
